description: Tolle is another one of Kira Yamato`s friends who also lives on the neutral colony Heliopolis and the boyfriend of Miriallia Haw. Tolle was the first one to defend Kira, when Kira`s Coordinator heritage causes the Archangel`s soldiers to point their rifles at Kira. He serves as a co-pilot and operator of the Archangel. Later, he volunteers to pilot the second FX-550 Skygrasper, formerly piloted by Cagalli Yula Athha. He is ultimately killed in action by Athrun Zala.
name: Tolle Koenig
